title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2186/98 of 9 October 1998 providing for a temporary derogation from Regulation (EC) No 1466/95 laying down special detailed rules of application for export refunds on milk and milk products
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2186/98 of 9 October 1998 providing for a temporary derogation from Regulation (EC) No 1466/95 laying down special detailed rules of application for export refunds on milk and milk products
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: This Regulation shall apply to the products falling within CN code 0406 for which export licences have been issued pursuant to Regulation (EC) No 1466/95 containing the indication 'Russia` in box 7 in accordance with Article 1(2) of that Regulation.

On application by the holder submitted before 16 October 1998, the validity of the export licences referred to in Article 1 applied for before 29 August 1998, excluding those whose validity elapsed before 1 August 1998, shall be extended to 30 November 1998.
Member States shall notify to the Commission the quantities of products covered by the above measure before 30 November 1998.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 9 October 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
